GSD.description:
loop: Check for overflow while configuring loop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.327 by commit 18e28817cb516b39de6281f6db9b0618b2cc7b42. For more details please see the references link.
